revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Mt. Chimney Crater |image = [[File:Mt. Chimney.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Mt. Chimney Crater. |tokens = 20,000 |location = North of Route 112, east of Lavaridge Town. }} '''Mt. Chimney Crater''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Hoenn]]. It initially has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 460,000 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | rowspan=3|<center>N/A || [[File:Team_Magma_Grunt_(female).png|40px]] Team Magma Grunt || [[File:Numel.png|40px]] Numel |- | [[File:Team_Magma_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Magma Grunt || [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat |- | [[File:Magma_Admin.png|40px]] '''Magma Admin Tabitha*''' || [[File:Numel.png|40px]] Numel, [[File:Poochyena.png|40px]] Poochyena, [[File:Numel.png|40px]] Numel, [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat |- |}
'''Note: Tabitha is 1/2 as likely as the other trainers to appear as a random encounter - he appears 20% of the time'''
===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | colspan=2 rowspan=3|<center> N/A || rowspan=3|[[File:Magma_Leader.png|40px]] Magma Leader Maxie || [[File:Mightyena.png|40px]] Mightyena, [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat || <center> 450,000 |- | [[File:Camerupt.png|40px]] Camerupt || <center> 470,000 |}

<tab name="Debuff"> After Reaching Kalos, the drop chance for items in Hoenn will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
